original_text: In the spring, Joab led the Israelite army out to fight. That was the time of year when kings go out to fight battles. Joab and his army attacked the land of the Ammonites and he won against them. He put his soldiers around Rabbah city so that they could attack it. But David had stayed in Jerusalem. Joab attacked Rabbah and he destroyed its buildings. Chronicles 19 Chronicles 21
korean_text: 해가 바뀌어 왕들이 출전할 때가 되매 요압이 그 군대를 거느리고 나가서 암몬 자손의 땅을 격파하고 들어가 랍바를 에워싸고 다윗은 예루살렘에 그대로 있더니 요압이 랍바를 쳐서 함락시키매

sentences.original_text: In the spring, Joab led the Israelite army out to fight.
sentences.korean_translation: 봄에, 요압이 이스라엘 군대를 이끌고 싸우러 나갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: That was the time of year when kings go out to fight battles.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 왕들이 전투를 하러 나가는 한 해의 그 시기였습니다.

sentences.original_text: Joab and his army attacked the land of the Ammonites
sentences.korean_translation: 요압과 그의 군대가 암몬 사람들의 땅을 공격했습니다

sentences.original_text: He put his soldiers around Rabbah city
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 군사들을 랍바 성 주변에 배치했습니다

sentences.original_text: so that they could attack it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들이 그것을 공격할 수 있도록 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But David had stayed in Jerusalem.
Joab attacked Rabbah and he destroyed its buildings.
sentences.korean_translation: 요압이 랍바를 공격했고 그는 그 건물들을 파괴했습니다.
